logTemplate:
<%*
const dtfmt = "YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ";
let emoji = "🍅";
if (log.mode == "WORK") {
    if (!log.finished) {
        emoji = "🟡";
    } else {
        emoji = "🍅"
    }
} else {
    emoji = "☕"
}
tR = `- (pomodoro::${emoji}) Started: (begin::${log.begin.format(dtfmt)}), Ended: (end::${log.end.format(dtfmt)}). ${log.task.name ? `Worked on: (focused::[[/${encodeURI(log.task.path)}${log.task.blockLink}|${log.task.name}]]), focusing` : 'Focused'} for (duration::${log.duration}) minutes`
%>
